Colorado_Springs.The Citadel (mall): Citadel Mall, one of the largest shopping malls in the state, is a regional 1,138,527 square feet (105,773 m2) shopping mall located in Charleston, South Carolina, United States. It opened on July 29, 1981 and is located at the intersection of Sam Rittenberg Boulevard (SC Hwy. 7) and I-526.
